goal.en: To learn the Finite Elemnts Method and related programming
goal.ch: 學習「有限元素法」之理論及相關電腦程式之執行

content.en:
1. Finite element error analysis
2. Structural elements
3. Transient analysis methods
4. Matrix Systems Analysis of the Solution
content.ch:
1. 有限元素誤差分析
2. 結構構件元素
3. 暫態分析方法
4. 矩陣系統求解分析

textbook.en:
"1. An Introduction to the Finite Element Method, J.N. Reddy
2. The Finite Element Method, Zienkiewicz and Taylor"
textbook.ch:
"1. An Introduction to the Finite Element Method, J.N. Reddy
2. The Finite Element Method, Zienkiewicz and Taylor"

en.competency: The Ability of Planning and Implementing Research Projects
The Ability in Writing Technical Papers
The Ability in Research, Innovation, and Problem Solving
The Ability of Interdisciplinary Integration and Coordination
International Perspective and Concept of Sustainable Development

ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習

ch.competency: 策劃及執行專題研究之能力
